text_block_list.text:
Hishi Amazon and I had come to the cafeteria, 
with its buffet-style service, for lunch.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Ooh, picked up a bunch of stuff, didn't ya, Big T! Which sides did you get today?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Hm? The look of those plates feels familiar. 
… You eating the same thing all the time?

I have to admit I have a hard time moving away 
from the griddle-cooked options. They've become 
an easy go-to. When I told her this, though…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
How spiritless and indulgent! You're letting yourself 
get caught up in the same old routine, Big T!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
That's not healthy and you know it. 
Ditch the complacency, get some variety in your diet!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
On that topic, physical activity is just as important as diet. 
I've been asking myself lately…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Are you getting enough exercise, Big T? You're not thinking 
you can leave the physical work to us and watch comfortably 
from the sidelines, are you?
choice_data_list: I think I'm doing just about enough……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Just about!? You think that's all it takes to have 
the physique required of a trainer!?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
We can't be having this, now. Right, you just leave it to me! 
On my pride as Miho RA, I'll whip ya into shape.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Come on, follow me!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
We're gonna start with a light jog! You're done 
when you pass me! One, two, gooooooo!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
What's that lazy walk about? You call that running? 
How're you gonna firm up going that slow?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Let's move on to weights. And don't think you're getting away 
with resting after one set. You're doing circuit training!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Arms, legs, core! Arms, legs, core! Now, as a rest, we can 
work on your back! Show me your bow pose!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
What's that supposed to be? Where's the curve?! 
Put your back into it, even a violin bow would laugh at you!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Hey, don't go all slack on me! I'll take a one-on-one anytime, 
but I won't have a one-and-done!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hm? Big T?! ……Big T. Huaah… what a sorry sight. Maybe I should start calling ya Lil' T.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Ahahaha, I might've gotten just a liiiittle too into it. 
My bad, it's kind of a habit……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: I can't help but want to take care of the people around me.
choice_data_list: You'll make someone very happy one day.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: H-H-Huh!? Why do you gotta make it embarrassing like that～! And it ain't nothing that sweet!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I just always want to take the lead is what it is. 
Walking side by side with someone isn't something 
I've ever done before.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Even now, trying to do so with you, it's hard for me to grasp 
our relationship or how I should act sometimes.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I have zero issues facing off with anyone, but standing 
side by side is a whole different matter, huh.
choice_data_list: You'll get used to it, step by step.
You'll get used to it, step by step.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Step by step… You're right, we just gotta give it a go! 
I don't know if it'll work out…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: But we're only just getting to know each other, after all!
choice_data_list: That's right! Glad to be with you!
That's right! Glad to be with you!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Same here! Hahah, looks like you got some mojo back.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Great, because that's the end of your break! 
Let's get back to it.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Whoa, don't look at me like that. I told you, once you got me caring for you, you got me caring. Big sister style.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Come on then, run, run! Hahaha, anyone watching would be 
confused who's training who. Can't say I dislike it, though!

She might be not be used to matching pace with someone, 
but all the same, Hishi Amazon tried to for the first time…
